job_tasks.phrase: Medior Dev Ops Engineer GenAI (Job Title)
job_tasks.justification: The job title 'Dev Ops Engineer GenAI' directly implies a focus on the operational aspects of Generative AI systems, which falls under the definition of Operations & MLOps (LLMOps) as per the coding book.

profile.rationale: The job title 'Medior Dev Ops Engineer GenAI' indicates a role focused on the operational aspects (DevOps) of Generative AI systems. DevOps tasks fall under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering), specifically Operations & MLOps. As the role is primarily operational and not focused on model development (Macro-Category B), it best fits the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile, which is characterized by predominantly Macro-Category A tasks supporting AI/ML features.

confidence.reasoning: The provided job advertisement consists solely of a job title. There is no descriptive text detailing responsibilities, technologies, or soft skills, making the analysis highly speculative and based entirely on inference from the title.
